name: blogging_system
description: This Blogging System has the following functionality. The users can signup, login, perform CRUD operations, Image Upload and Comment on other posts. Functionality wise we would perform: CRUD, DB Migrations, DB Seeds, Data Validation, Authentications(Token Based), Image Uploading and Relationships. We would use express and sequelize Note: You would need a database for this to work Database Tables: => users
